  <p>currentTime1:{{currentTime1()}}</p>
  <p>currentTime2:{{currentTime2}}</p>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  var vm = new Vue({
	el: "#app",
	data: {
	  message: "pan",
	},
	methods: {
	  //\u76D1\u542C\u4E8B\u4EF6
	  currentTime1: function () {
		return Date.now();
	  },
	},
	computed: {
	//\u8BA1\u7B97\u5C5E\u6027\uFF1Amethods\uFF0Ccomputed\u65B9\u6CD5\u540D\u4E0D\u80FD\u91CD\u540D\uFF0Cmethods \u4F18\u5148\u7EA7\u8DDF\u9AD8
	  currentTime2: function () {
		this.message;
		return Date.now();
	  },
	},
  });
<\/script>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"vue","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<div id="app">
    \u59D3\u540D\uFF1A{{ fullName }}
</div>

<script>
var app = new Vue({
  el: "#app",
  data: {
    firstName: "Jack",
    lastName: "Green",
  },
  computed: {
    fullName: {
      //getter \u8BFB\u53D6
      get: function () {
        return this.firstName + " " + this.lastName;
      },
      //setter \u5199\u5165\u65F6\u89E6\u53D1
      set: function (newValue) {
        var names = newValue.split(" ");
        this.firstName = names[0];
        this.lastName = names[names.length - 1];
      },
    },
  },
});
<\/script>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"html","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<div id="app-6">
  <button v-on:click="sayHi">\u70B9\u6211</button>
  <p>{{ message }}</p>
  <button v-on:click="reverseMessage">\u53CD\u8F6C\u6D88\u606F</button>
</div>
<script>
  var app6 = new Vue({
    el: "#app-6",
    data: {
      message: "Hello World",
    },
    methods: {
      sayHi: function () {
        //'this'\u5728\u65B9\u6CD5\u91CC\u9762\u6307\u5411\u5F53\u524DVue\u5B9E\u4F8B
        alert(this.message);
      },
      reverseMessage: function () {
        this.message = this.message.split("").reverse().join("");
      },
    },
  });
<\/script>

  <h1 v-if="type==='A'">A</h1>
  <h1 v-else-if="type==='B'">B</h1>
  <h1 v-else-if="type==='D'">D</h1>
  <h1 v-else>C</h1>

</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
  var app4 = new Vue({
    el: "#app-4",
    data: {
      type: "A",
    },
  });
<\/script>

  <label>{{ message }}</label>
  <br />
  \u5355\u590D\u9009\u6846\uFF1A
  <!--\u4E0D\u9700\u8981v-model\uFF0Cv-bind\u7ED1\u5B9A\u4E00\u4E2A\u5E03\u5C14\u503C\u5373\u53EF\uFF0C\u4E3A\u771F\u65F6\u9009\u4E2D-->
  <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox" v-model="checked" />
  <label for="checkbox">{{checked}}</label>
  <br />
  \u5355\u9009\u6846\u6309\u94AE
  <!--\u7EC4\u5408\u4E92\u65A5\u7528v-model\u914D\u5408value\u4F7F\u7528-->
  <input type="radio" id="one" value="One" v-model="picked" />
  <label for="one">One</label>
  <input type="radio" id="two" value="Two" v-model="picked" />
  <label for="two">Two</label>
  <span>\u9009\u4E2D\u7684\u503C\uFF1A{{picked}}</span>
  <br />

  \u591A\u590D\u9009\u6846\uFF1A
  <!--\u540C\u4E0A-->
  <input type="checkbox" id="jack" value="Jack" v-model="checkedNames" />
  <label for="jack">Jack</label>
  <input type="checkbox" id="join" value="Join" v-model="checkedNames" />
  <label for="join">Jack</label>
  <input type="checkbox" id="mike" value="Mike" v-model="checkedNames" />
  <label for="mike">Mike</label>
  <span>\u9009\u4E2D\u7684\u503C\uFF1A{{checkedNames}}</span>
  <br />

  \u4E0B\u62C9\u6846:
  <!--otion\u4E2D\u6709value\u5219\u4F18\u5148\u5339\u914D\uFF0C\u6CA1\u6709\u5339\u914Dtext-->
  <!--select\u4E2D \u6DFB\u52A0\u5C5E\u6027 multiple\u5219\u591A\u9009\uFF0C\u6B64\u65F6v-model\u7ED1\u5B9A\u6570\u7EC4-->
  <select v-model="pan">
    <option value="" disabled>---\u8BF7\u9009\u62E9---</option>
    <option>A</option>
    <option>B</option>
    <option>C</option>
    <option>D</option>
  </select>
  <span>value:{{pan}}</span>
</div>
<script>
  var app7 = new Vue({
    el: "#app-7",
    data: {
      message: "Hello World",
      checked: false,
      checkedNames: [],
      picked: "",
      pan: "",
    },
  });
<\/script>

  <pan></pan>
</div>
<script>
  //\u5148\u6CE8\u518C\u7EC4\u4EF6

    template: "<li>Hello</li>",
    data: function () {
      return {
        message: "sd",
      };
    },
    //\u7EC4\u4EF6\u4E2D\u7684data\u5FC5\u987B\u65F6\u51FD\u6570\uFF0C\u7136\u540E\u5C06\u6570\u636Ereturn\u51FA\u53BB
  });
  //\u518D\u5B9E\u4F8B\u5316Vue
  var vm = new Vue({
    el: "#app",
  });
<\/script>

  });

    el: "#app",
    data: {
      items: ["java", "Linux", "\u524D\u7AEF"],
    },
  });
<\/script>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"vue","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<div id="vue">
  <todo>
        <todo-title slot="todo-title" :title="title"></todo-title>
        <!--v-bind:item \u7B80\u5199-->
        <todo-items slot="todo-items" v-for="item in todoItems" :item="item"></todo-items>
    </todo>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
Vue.component("todo", {
  template:
    '<div>\\
                    <slot name="todo-title"></slot>\\
                    <ul>\\
                        <slot name="todo-items"></slot>\\
                    </ul>\\
                </div>',
});
Vue.component("todo-title", {
  props: ["title"],
  template: "<div>{{title}}</div>",
});
Vue.component("todo-items", {
  props: ["item"],
  template: "<li>{{item}}</li>",
});

var vm = new Vue({
  el: "#vue",
  data: {
    title: "\u79E6\u8001\u5E08\u7CFB\u5217\u8BFE\u7A0B",
    todoItems: ["\u72C2\u795E\u8BF4Java", "test2", "test3"],
  },
});
<\/script>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import Vue from "vue";
import Router from "vue-router";
//\u5BFC\u5165\u7EC4\u4EF6
import Content from "../components/Content";
import Main from "../components/Main";

//\u5B89\u88C5\u8DEF\u7531
Vue.use(Router);

//\u914D\u7F6E\u8DEF\u7531
export default new Router({
 mode: "history",
 routes: [
   {
	 //\u8DEF\u7531\u8DEF\u5F84
	 path: "/content",
	 //\u8DEF\u7531\u540D\u79F0
	 name: "content",
	 //\u8DF3\u8F6C\u5230\u7EC4\u4EF6
	 component: Content,
   },
   {
	 //\u8DEF\u7531\u8DEF\u5F84
	 path: "/main",
	 //\u8DEF\u7531\u540D\u79F0
	 name: "main",
	 //\u8DF3\u8F6C\u5230\u7EC4\u4EF6
	 component: Main,
   },
 ],
});
